2. Staff Directory

Staff Directory
===============

  
The following is an alphabetical listing of the various departments located within our city. Click on any of the departments for a listing of the contacts within that department.   
  
For 24/7 City of Weatherford utility service interruptions, please call 817-598-4257.  
  


Search the Directory

Category:

Staff Directory    Weatherford Animal Services    City Council    City Hall    City Manager's Office    City Secretary's Office    Communications and Marketing    Development Services        Planning Division        Building Division        Code Enforcement    Economic Development    Emergency Management    Finance        Accounting        Purchasing    Fire Department    Human Resources    Information Technology & GIS/Mapping    Weatherford Public Library    Municipal Court    Parks, Recreation & Special Events    Police Department        REACT    Public Works        Engineering Division        Streets Division        Traffic Division    Solid Waste and Recycling        Sanitation Division    Utilities Department        Electric Division        Utility Billing         Water Utilities    Water Utilities

First Name:

Last Name:
